sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the State Agency Web Site Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Cookies and other invasive tracking programs.
sections.text: Cookies and other invasive tracking programs.

sections.heading: State agency Web site license application accessibility
sections.text: An executive branch State agency shall make applications for licenses under the jurisdiction of that State agency accessible by means of a State agency Web site to the general public no later than January 1, 2017.
